text: ok do anyone else experience weird HubDB issues, where suddenly your modules returns as if the table is empty, even though it isn't ?

i haven't been working on a module for a week, i return and suddenly everything returned for HubDB is empty, like the tables seem to be empty.. if i run the module in preview mode, the data is there..
some kind of weird caching issue ?
i tried unpublishing all my tables and publishing them again.. now it does not work in preview mode either

Is anyone else having issues with social sharing dynamic pages in HubDB? I'm using the Facebook Debugging Tool (<https://developers.facebook.com/tools/debug/sharing/>) to test dynamic pages before sharing and I'm getting this error: *Curl error: 61 (BAD_CONTENT_ENCODING)*. I tested this on multiple sites and see the error on all.
We are using Dynamic Pages to show books however the search cannot find any of the dynamic pages searching for keywords in the title. Is there something I am missing?

Which search?
The one on the website pages on HubSpot?
Could you DM me the details, I can take a look
sending one to you right now <@UD5NW4PJ5>
